Title: Requires schools report certain threats and acts of violence to the federal bureau of investigations, the state police, and the office of mental health
Summary: Requires schools report certain threats and acts of violence to the federal bureau of investigation, the state police, and the office of mental health.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring schools report certain threats and acts of violence to the federal bureau of investigations, the state police, and the office of mental health
